title: Scallops with leek and chestnut
description: Earthy chestnuts and sweet scallops are a match made in heaven in this simple starter served with a creamy sauce.
ingredients: 2 leeks, white part only, rinsed and sliced
25g/1oz fresh ginger, peeled and chopped finely
18 scallops in the shell, cleaned, roes removed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
